meanings.definition: A plant of the lily family with nodding flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the fritillaries swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The fritillaries added a touch of elegance to the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns among the fritillaries.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter cascaded through the room like a field of blooming fritillaries.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the fritillaries painted a beautiful picture in the garden.

meanings.definition: A butterfly with chequered markings on the wings.
meanings.sent1: The fritillaries fluttered gracefully from flower to flower.
meanings.sent2: Children chased the fritillaries in the meadow on a sunny day.
meanings.sent3: The picnic turned into a fritillaries-watching adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts danced like fritillaries in the summer sky.
meanings.sent5: The field was alive with the delicate dance of fritillaries.
